title: Why is the Tribunal always down for maintenance?
body: Why is the Tribunal always down for maintenance? Or is it just my computer?

replies.body:
They took it down for "maintanance" years ago. and It hasnt been up sinse.
Thier excuse for "maintanance" was just a way of saying "We are removing it for good so we can replace it with this faulty autmated system that doesnt work, But we cant tell you that. So we will just say maintenance because its an excuse you will accept"

Actually, the new Tribunal voting is fairly close. We'll definitely have it for next season. The feeder detection, instant feedback etc. just had priority because Tribunal voting was notoriously slow, and the instant feedback is very accurate and quick.
Lyte's departure and the switch of focus to the LCU means it isn't a priority, you're going to have to get over it. You can't honestly expect Lyte to follow through when he's no longer here.

As if Riot doesn't have anymore employees or a hefty amount of income to afford the resources to get it done? I just found it funny that it's still down with no official updates on why for quite sometime or even a status update.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=HT5o2ymo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-06T07:51:47.809+0000)
>
> Actually, the new Tribunal voting is fairly close. We'll definitely have it for next season. The feeder detection, instant feedback etc. just had priority because Tribunal voting was notoriously slow, and the instant feedback is very accurate and quick.

how do you know?
is there an update somewhere?
[Lyte's ask.fm](http://ask.fm/RiotLyte). He gets asked about these things a lot, so it's been mentioned quite a bit, though there's no date.
It's not actually down for maintenance; it's just "down." Riot gave it the axe it's not a thing until further notice.

_Can we expect to see this Tribunal back up? I never used it, but I know that in the past it used to give 50 IP for 5 judges or how it was called, which was a nice deal. And I had fun seeing videos which contained specific moments in the game and the funny comments of people which got reported. I would like to see it come back one day._
